about_the_game:
• Invite up to 4 players
  • Optional A.I. for solo players
  • Controller support
  • Remappable keyboard control
  • 5 PvP maps, 2 Co-op maps,
  • 40 handcrafted challenge levels
  • 5 types of tanks for different playstyles
  • Seamless edge warping
  • Destructible terrain for added tactical play
  • Richochetting bullet allowing for clutch parries
  • Taunts

GAME MODES

PVP MAPS
  • Combat : This mode is won either by defeating your opponents or by covering a large portion of the canvas with your paint
  • Night Maze : Splash your paint to reveal your surroundings as you navigate through the invisible maze
  • Ocean Mist : When you're tired of looking at dry paint, join this map for a refreshing watercolor experience
  • Desert : Weave through rolling tumbleweeds to take down your enemy in the sandstorm
  • Hanabi : Glide through the night sky while dropping some fireworks!

CO-OP MAPS
  • Torch Light : Zombies approach under the shroud of shadows. Keep the torches lit to mark your safe zones.
  • Arcade : Defend against waves of invading Greys that are overtaking the map by monochrome

CHALLENGE MODE
40 challenging levels for players looking for more handcrafted and challenging content.

TANKS

  • RIFLE: Sharpshooter tank. In Arcade mode, Rifle has the highest damage and can reliably take down targets
  • SPLASH: Shotgun tank. Powerful up close but slow rotation speed leaves its flank vulnerable
  • GRENADE: Mid-range AOE attacker. Its grenade can be guided by the tank's facing direction, powerful in the hand of an expert.
  • BOUNCER: Bouncer bullets will bounce towards the nearest enemy. Try to score a triple kill when enemies are clustered up
  • SEEKER: Fast-moving with no recoil, for players that want to stay on the move. Circle-in like a shark and assassinate the enemy with homing missiles

name: Warbrush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Nostalgic for some arcade-styled tank action? Warbrush is taking you back to 1977 in style and flavor. Complete with team co-op, solo campaign, and multiple PvP modes, Warbrush is the full package experience to arcade styled, single-stick, tank combat.
